text: Yeh jahan bhi paye gaye inpar zillat ki maar hi padi, kahin Allah ke zimme ya Insaano ke zimme mein panaah mil gayi to yeh aur baat hai, yeh Allah ke gazab mein ghir chuke hain, inpar mohtaji o magloobi musallat kardi gayi hai (Allah's wrath, and humiliation is stuck upon them), aur yeh sabkuch sirf is wajah se hua hai ke yeh Allah ki aayat se kufr karte rahey aur inhon ne paigambaron ko na-haqq qatal kiya. Yeh inki nafarmaniyon aur zyadatiyon ka anjam hai
